general.ieee1284: MFG:MFPrinter;MDL: Laser Pro LL2 1;CMD:AUTOMATIC,PJL,GDI_RL;DES:MFPrinter Laser Pro LL2 1;CLS:PRINTER;VER:v2.07g ;NS:L510245LA020328;

comments.en:
This is one of the few Ricoh laser printers which neither understands PostScript nor PCL. It uses the proprietary SAG-GDI raster format from Sagem Communication.

The "rastertosag-gdi" driver for this format is a simple CUPS filter written in Python, which you can download from this site.
